DOC.brief_title: Liposomal Bupivacaine With Bupivacaine Ankle Fracture ORIF
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , randomize control trial assess pain control ankle fracture repair open reduction internal fixation . Patients consent enrolled pre-operatively , randomize either control liposomal bupivacaine bupivacaine administer intra-operatively . Patients remain blinded treatment arm . The surgeon non-blinded administers bupivacaine solution locally , intra-operatively . Patients pain score pain medication usage document . A trained research coordinator contact patient 24 , 48 , 72 hour post-operatively assess pain level VAS scale pain medication take . Patients return followup standard interval 2 week , 6 week , 3 month , 6 month , 1 year post-operatively ass heal functional outcome . Patients queried satisfaction pain control 2 week post-operatively . The study compare outcomes include pain level , pain medication take , OR PACU time , LOS , satisfaction pain control , clinical outcome , complication rate .
